subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Spanish club had it all when it beat Milan to advance in the Champions League: Lionel Messi looking as good as ever, David Villa looking like the old sniper, and the club dominating the ball.
snippet: The Spanish club had it all when it beat Milan to advance in the Champions League: Lionel Messi looking as good as ever, David Villa looking like the old sniper, and the club dominating the ball.
